SEARCH
Package br.com.concepting.framework.security.service

Class LoginSessionServiceImpl<L extends LoginSessionModel,U extends UserModel,LP extends LoginParameterModel>

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.service.BaseService<L>
br.com.concepting.framework.security.service.LoginSessionServiceImpl<L,U,LP>
Type Parameters:
L - Class that defines the login session data model.
U - Class that defines the userdata model.
LP - Class that defines the login parameter data model.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICrud<L>, LoginSessionService<L,U,LP>, IService<L>
public abstract class LoginSessionServiceImpl<L extends LoginSessionModel,U extends UserModel,LP extends LoginParameterModel> extends BaseService<L> implements LoginSessionService<L,U,LP>
Class that defines the basic implementation of the login session service.

      Does the user authentication.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Instance that contains the authenticated user data model.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - Occurs when the user was not found.

      Instance that contains the login session data model.
